name: Archery Rivals
description:
This is an archer's match game.A casual lowpoly complete game.

Instead of controlling the archer, the player moves the arrow through gestures, manipulates the wind to guide the flight and finally shoots the target.

After killing one target, our archers will jump right from the first platform to the second platform and attack the enemy on the third platform.

The game has 100 levels, each with its own goals, such as how many enemies to defeat, hit a tower , and so on.

Features:
- This is a complete game with all the physics mechanics.
- Simple and highly addictive.
- 100 Incredible levels.
- Free Game
